original_title: Ray Charles: Live at the Olympia
overview: Legendary musician Ray Charles turned the lemons of transportation trouble into the sweet lemonade of an unplugged concert. With his band stranded at the airport, Charles had only his drummer, a guitar player, and a bass player with him in Paris for the performance. Though understandably late, the show went on, and what resulted was a creative concert that stands out in Charles's stellar performance history.
title: Ray Charles: Live at the Olympia
